scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/mobile/flutter && flutter pub get || true
scripts.build:all: npm run build:js && npm run build:flutter
scripts.test:all: npm run test:js && npm run test:flutter
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces && cd packages/mobile/flutter && flutter clean || true
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:flutter
scripts.release: npm run check-publish-readiness && npm run prepare-publish && npm run publish-packages
